attributes.action: Exempt children under 11 from counting towards the 'Rule of Six' in England
attributes.additional_details:
Health experts have stated that transmission of Covid-19 by under 11s is very low. 
Under 11s are already exempt from the rule in Wales and Scotland.
attributes.background: From 14th Sept, the 'Rule of Six' will make it illegal for groups of more than 6 to meet indoors or outdoors, with under 11s included in this total. The Government needs to make under 11s exempt to allow children to see grandparents and caregivers to meet others for support and good mental health.
